item.title: Site revival
item.description: Recently I decided to revive this site. I gave it a new face using hugo, which I find to be more of a pleeasure to use than Jekyll as of late. My future plans for this site will be to write and share about music, books, and science. It’s an effort to go back to the way things were prior to joining the tech industry. I’m also working to get ash//tephra up and going finally.
